constituent: aroma, bound up, spoon, sitting on the ground
heisigStory: You will have to imagine "capturing" a favorite aroma by having it gagged and bound up in a spoon.
koohiiStory1: The muchacho sits down bound up to enjoy his own aroma.
koohiiStory2: If you bind up a person and let him sit for several days, an unpleasant aroma will result.
kunYomi: にお.う、にお.い、にお.わせる
myStory: hương. mùi. muỗng múc ngồi bệt
words:
匂い(におい): odour, scent, smell, stench, fragrance, aroma, perfume
匂う(におう): be fragrant, smell, to stink, glow, be bright
